alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 9:53PM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Shawnee, east central Wabaunsee and south central Jackson Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 953 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dover, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Topeka, Rossville, Dover, Silver Lake, Hoyt, Maple Hill, Willard and Keene. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 341 and 355. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for east central Kansas.
